gallery.title: Progressive Web Apps-- websites that you download
gallery.copy: PWAs connect elements of both mobile and desktop user experience, making websites feel like apps. Your business homepage will look great on any screen size, and can download to any device! We use responsive design and cross-browser testing, and optimize your page's load time on all devices in order to make your brand truly cross-platform.

gallery.title: Managed Cloud Services
gallery.copy: We build with web-scale services like Netlify and AWS Cloudfront, offering world-class uptime, security and performance. Running your app with a serverless paradigm, or services like in AWS LightSail, can translate into a big reduction in ops cost.

gallery.title: Business Technology Consulting
gallery.copy: We can help with small business tech integrations and existing websites. Do you need to add a Shopify service to your WordPress page? CMS, DNS, domains & hosting: we handle it all for small businesses-- reach out to learn how we've helped folks like you.

projects.title: Top 100 Crypto
projects.copy: Live cryptocurrency prices via serverless API integration.

projects.title: StardewDex
projects.copy: Installable index app with noSQL data layer, searchable inventory. Static hosting on AWS S3/Cloudfront. Features Google AdSense.

projects.title: Minority Veterans of America homepage
projects.copy: Migration of a nonprofit's WordPress to managed AWS hosting.
